channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: True and the Rainbow Kingdom
channel.desc: It's triple the trouble when True, Bartleby and Grizelda come to babysit the mischievous Yeti newborns and a flood breaks out in Yeti Village.

channel.title: Mittens & Pants
channel.desc: Mittens rides along with Fire Chief Grapefruit for the day; the chief gets worried when Mittens begins rescuing things from high places in a way he's never been able to do.

channel.desc: Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens, and why do they want to remain anonymous? Will Paddington crack the case?

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: With his favorite sweater in the wash, Gary refuses to participate in the cool science experiments his friends are doing; Gary learns that having favorite things doesn't make or break the fun.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: Nate must deliver Jaden's science fair project, a confetti-erupting volcano, to the school for the science fair before it erupts.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: Everyone loves "Super Train" comics, and Nate must make sure the latest issue doesn't arrive late for story time at School Station.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mighty Express
channel.desc: When a surprise safety inspection threatens Liza, Nico and Max's fun, it's Rescue Red to the rescue.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: When Calls the Heart
channel.desc: After Hope Valley learns redemption is possible, Abigail and Frank pursue a romance before the heart of the town is tested by the threat of a gang of outlaws.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A house with as much natural light as possible is top of the property shopping list; Jules Hudson is just the person to find it in the region of the Bedfordshire borders.

channel.desc: Lauren confides her troubles to Bobby; Carla suspects Betsy of manipulating Lisa.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Son of a Critch

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Karena and Kasey's Foreign Flavours
channel.desc: Kasey and Karena face one of their toughest challenges ever when they cook for a lineup of some of Peru's top chefs in one of Lima's best restaurants.
